quantity_limit_orders: Quantity of limit orders you'll be buying from
unique_sellers: Unique sellers you'll be buying from
market_limit_orders_buying_from: Market limit orders you're buying from
market_limit_orders_desc: These are the existing limit orders on the order book that you will be purchasing from when you place your instant trade.
no_orders_to_purchase: Not yet intending to purchase from any existing market limit orders.
limit_order_details: These are the underlying details of this individual limit order on the order book.
on_fill_desc: This limit order in the order book has an "on fill" condition, which may repeat this order at or near its current price once purchased.
description: Enter how much {{assetB}} you want by selling {{assetA}}, you will be matched with existing bid orders.
